video_name: 复杂情况_周杰伦_2_英文_口播_小女孩_1.mp4
prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A man in his late twenties or early thirties sits inside a modern bus, dressed casually in a brown suede jacket over a cream sweater and light gray trousers, paired with clean white sneakers. He has short dark hair and a relaxed yet expressive demeanor. Beside him rests a sleek metallic suitcase with vertical ridges, its handle lightly held by his right hand. His left arm is bent with the hand resting near his shoulder, fingers gently curled as if mid-gesture. He begins by facing forward, then smoothly turns his head to the side as if responding to someone off-camera, his mouth opening expressively as he speaks with calm emphasis, lips moving with clear, fluid motion. After a moment, he returns his gaze to the front, continuing to speak with gentle animation, his shoulders shifting slightly with each phrase. The interior of the bus features blue upholstered seats and orange handrails, with natural daylight streaming through large windows that reveal blurred urban buildings outside. The lighting is soft and even, enhancing the quiet, contemplative mood of travel. His movements are unhurried and deliberate, conveying ease and presence as he communicates with subtle hand gestures and thoughtful head turns. The camera holds steady at eye level, capturing his upper body and the surrounding environment with clarity and warmth, emphasizing his composed yet lively expression as he engages in conversation.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering, abrupt cuts, and unnatural scene transitions. A deformed, disfigured man in his late twenties or early thirties sits inside a glitched, abstract bus interior — his face warped with deep, unnatural wrinkles, crooked teeth misaligned and protruding, mouth frozen in a rigid, unchanging shape despite attempted speech. His short dark hair is pixelated and unevenly textured. He wears a low-resolution, oversaturated tan jacket over a cream sweater and gray trousers, all rendered with jagged edges and color bleeding; white sneakers appear smudged and asymmetrical. His right hand is grotesquely twisted, fingers broken and fused, clutching a fragmented, half-rendered gold suitcase with missing wheels and warped ridges. His left arm spasms violently, elbow locked at an impossible angle, fingers trembling in a seizure-like motion. The bus interior flickers between grainy textures and striped patterns — blue seats dissolve into noise, orange handrails warp into jagged lines, windows show no city but static and collaged artifacts. Lighting is harsh, inconsistent, and overly contrasted — casting sharp, unnatural shadows that strobe across his face, creating eerie highlights on misshapen features. No natural illumination; instead, extreme high contrast and artificial sharpness amplify visual noise. Camera movement is erratic, jolting between eye-level and skewed angles, frequently cutting mid-motion, breaking composition, and introducing floating logos or unreadable text overlays. Entire scene feels like a corrupted 3D animation — low-quality, glitchy, surreal, and physically impossible, with no smooth transitions, only stuttering, broken gestures, and frozen expressions.

prompt:
FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A woman wearing an elegant black sequined gown with feathered detailing sits poised against a clean white backdrop, her expression shifting subtly as she speaks with expressive openness. The scene features a young East Asian woman, likely in her late twenties, with neatly pulled-back dark hair and soft makeup highlighting her eyes and lips. She wears a luxurious layered necklace, dangling earrings, and a gold wristwatch, all catching the light as she moves gently. Her lips part with graceful motion as she begins to speak, conveying emotion through smooth articulation and relaxed rhythm. 

She starts by turning her head fully toward the camera, facing forward with quiet confidence, then slowly pivots to her right side, allowing the light to trace the curve of her cheek and shoulder. As she continues speaking, her hands rise slightly, fingers lightly interlaced near her chin, moving in gentle arcs that mirror the cadence of her voice. She then returns her gaze and head to the front, completing the turn with calm precision, her posture remaining composed yet alive with subtle gesture. 

The background remains pure white, emphasizing her silhouette and attire, while soft studio lighting enhances the shimmer of her dress and jewelry without harsh shadows. The atmosphere is refined and serene, capturing a moment of poised communication. The camera holds steady at chest level, smoothly framing her upper body and capturing every fluid motion of her hands and head as she speaks with measured grace and expressive presence.
negative_prompt:
FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering, abrupt cuts, and unnatural scene transitions. A deformed, disfigured figure without coherent features, rendered as a low-resolution, unrealistic 3D animation with cartoonish exaggeration and abstract distortion. The woman’s face is grotesquely altered: her mouth remains frozen in a rigid, unnatural shape with misaligned, crooked teeth, while her lips do not move despite attempted speech. Deep, exaggerated wrinkles distort her skin texture; her eyes are asymmetrical and lifeless, with uneven lighting casting harsh, inconsistent shadows across her face. Her dark brown hair appears mangled and fragmented, with strands clipping through her skull or floating unnaturally.

Her hands are twisted, broken, and trembling violently — fingers warped into impossible angles, joints disjointed, nails elongated or missing, occasionally flickering in and out of frame. She attempts to clasp them near her chin, but the gesture collapses into spasmodic twitching, failing to echo any rhythm. Her posture is hunched and unstable, shoulders jarring upward and downward erratically, lacking grace or composure. The elegant black sequined gown is pixelated and glitchy, its feathered detailing melted into jagged, static-like edges; the pearl necklace and earrings are warped into geometric shards, the gold wristwatch stretched and duplicated across her arm.

The lighting is erratic and malformed — overexposed highlights bleach parts of her face while plunging others into crushing darkness, creating extreme contrast that flattens depth and detail. The background is a chaotic collage of grainy textures, vertical striped patterns, and digital noise, with floating logos and illegible text elements overlaying the scene. The camera moves with violent, disjointed jerks — zooming unpredictably, tilting off-axis, cutting abruptly between unstable close-ups and skewed wide shots. Composition is unstructured, framing is inconsistent, and every motion feels artificially accelerated or frozen mid-frame, destroying all sense of fluidity and poise. The entire sequence is low-quality, saturated beyond realism, sharpness pushed to artificial extremes, and plagued by compression artifacts and visual corruption.
